meanings.definition: A group of synthetic antibacterial drugs used to treat various infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed sulfadiazines to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Sulfadiazines are commonly used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were scared of the sulfadiazines, so they ran away!
meanings.sent4: The sulfadiazines acted like tiny soldiers attacking the bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The sulfadiazines were like superheroes fighting off the evil bacteria invaders.

meanings.sent1: She bought two bottles of sulfadiazines from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent2: The doctor asked how many sulfadiazines she had left.
meanings.sent3: The sulfadiazines on the shelf seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The sulfadiazines in the bottle looked like a colorful collection of pills.
meanings.sent5: Counting the sulfadiazines was like counting tiny pebbles in a jar.
